poem.title: Braille for Beginners
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Tina's out on bail. Her daddy's rich Therefore her children shall be rich. Capisc'? Now whence the lolly... beauty, vigour, youth? No, yes, no. Connections, guanxi. Brute force for brains. You should bet a bale of shirts On this particular horse if you're sure she'd not Charge on through the hedge when she got to the bend.
